def is_remote_control(x: item):
    # Check if the item is a remote control
    return is_remote_control(x)

behavior locate_remote_control(remote:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        # Character should be close to the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
            # If remote control is identified and not yet visited
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote)
            # Select the known remote control
            locate_remote_control(remote)
            # Move close to the remote
        else:
            # If remote controls location is unknown, start searching
            foreach item: item:
                if not visited(item): 
                    # Check all unvisited items
                    observe(item, "Check if this is the remote control for the DVD player")
                    # Observe items to find the remote control

    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control) # Ensure the character is close to the remote contr
ol

        if remote_graspable:
            achieve_once inhand(remote_control) # Pick up the remote control if it is grabbable
        achieve close_char(char, dvd_player) # Ensure the character is close to the DVD player
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Turn on the DVD player

behavior use_remote_control(remote:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        # Move close to the remote control
        achieve facing_char(char, remote)
        # Face the remote control
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Ensure the DVD player is turned on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and id[remote]==2052
        # Select the remote control with ID 2052
        
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player]==2061
        # Locate the DVD player with ID 2061
        
        use_remote_control(remote, dvd_player)
        # Use the remote control to turn on the DVD player

        # Temporarily hold the remote control to use it

        # Turn on the DVD player using the remote control

        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(dvd_player, remote_control)

def has_switch(dvd_player:item):
    # Function to check if the DVD player has a switch
    symbol switch_available=exists sw: item: has_switch(sw) and is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
    return switch_available

behavior turn_on_dvd(dvd_player:item, remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        if has_switch(dvd_player):
            bind switch: item where:
                has_switch(switch) and is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
            achieve is_on(dvd_player) 

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Identify the DVD player
        
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Identify the remote control
        
        turn_on_dvd(dvd_player, remote_control)
